name: Fishercat Torc <retro>
data: It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
